website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the Skechers Haniger was well received by consumers as it was deemed comfortable and durable. People also liked its style and price. Some users were not satisfied with the fit because it was too narrow for them. The sole unit was also an issue, with testers noting that it wore out fast.
pros: The comfortability offered by the Skechers Haniger gained the favor of a majority of wearers
Many consumers gave the shoe high marks for durability
The style and design pleased several reviewers
Some users thought it delivered good value for the price
A few buyers mentioned that the fit was perfect
cons: The pair of Skechers workout shoes was too narrow for some owners
The white version was deemed too bright by a few commenters
The outsole did not please a couple of testers because it got worn out quickly

customer_reviews.title: the last three pairs of which squeak like crazy. Unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes to replace the NB 608's that I usually get, the last three pairs of which squeak like crazy. Unacceptable. The Skechers version is okay, but fits a little larger than I expected. I can deal with that, though, by using the right after-market insoles. (Skechers memory foam insoles are the worst.) I'll probably buy them again, but I'll get the standard size instead of the wide to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is picky about his tennis shoes. They must be white with navy (odd, I know). Since Payless Shoe Stores closed he needed to find a replacement for his go to Champions that he's worn for years. These are reasonably priced, well made and comfortable. He's purchased 3 pairs just in case they are discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Lainie

customer_reviews.title: Quality, comfort and economy
customer_reviews.text: Quality workout shoes with good fit. Memory foam gives good comfort. Make from durable materials. Very economical shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Chamasazi

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo wide and comfortable! OMG! And with the memory foam inserts, like heaven on your feet! Get you a pair now! Most comfortable sneakers you will ever own, and these are extremely well made, and durable! Made to last for years! Next best thing to going barefoot! Feels like my favorite slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Antonowicz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these tennis shoes. He needs a size and width that is impossible to find in stores. These were a perfect fit for what he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find reasonably priced sneakers for my husband who wears a size 14. These fit perfectly and held up really well despite his being hard on shoes. He loved the way they fit and found them to be extremely comfortable from day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Patty B

customer_reviews.title: Skechers shoes
customer_reviews.text: Used these shoes for work. On my feet much of the time. Most comfortable shoes I have ever worn for work. Additionally, they are very light, as well. Would purchase this brand again. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my job.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a CO (correctional officer) and these are just right for my job. They are full leather and can take a shine, very comfortable, even after being on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Good product & good price
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these. Says they are comfortable and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: francese smith

customer_reviews.title: not bad, to wide but OK for my use
customer_reviews.text: Need something to stand in , behind a woman's styling chair, not bad, to wide but OK for my use. I'm also a runner, couldn't wear these to run in, have a second pair, zd with and that's to wide to run in! Overhaul, for the money, a Good Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: They look great and the memory foam was a real hit!
customer_reviews.text: These were given as a gift for my husband and he is very happy with them. I could not find a pair like the ones I had bought him a couple of years ago, but these worked out fine. he is one happy man. This is a very comfy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers are comfortable and slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift to my dad , He love his sketchers ! He has trouble walking on marble floors thinking that he going to fall...After he put them on he walk around his marble floor outside his home and had No problem walking ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He said the memory foam lining is really comfortable. True to size (ordered an 11)
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. He said the memory foam lining is really comfortable. True to size (ordered an 11).
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Best fit for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased sketchers because their wide shoe fits my wife foot perfectly. All my sketchers have in the past and this pair is the same. Dennis Shaub
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Shaub

customer_reviews.title: Great on the feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, The memory foam is all that my family wears. Great on the feet!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This ibrand is the most comfortable shoe I have gotten in this style. I would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Debi  Russell (igottahavenow)

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, have great stability left and right not wobbly. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mort

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I bought 1/2 size larger for my son and the fit was perfect. He loves sketchers and the style. Good looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S

customer_reviews.title: like it but memory foam is enigma for mi
customer_reviews.text: simple, chip, like it but memory foam is enigma for mi, i need a long time for answer...
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers Haniger Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Fit better than expected. This is a solid shoe and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jimd2k

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Like the gel insole but you can not remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Stark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Skechers. Quality items in casual and golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bilango

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expect from Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Only had the shoes for 3 months and some of the rubber on the bottom of the shoe is loose. Also squeaks when I walk.
customer_reviews.author: seattleguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Shoe for the Price. Actually . . . . Better!
customer_reviews.author: Perry Wood

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality
customer_reviews.text: Worst construction of a shoe. After one day of west black shoe turns white
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Fit good. Great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ROAD WARRIOR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Sketchers!!!! Great price for the most comfortable sneaker ever .ade
customer_reviews.author: kathy kessel

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Best sneakers I've had in quite a while for my "D" width feet. I really like the cushioned padding.
customer_reviews.author: EssenceOfBeing

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too large and bulky, plus they are heavy for a tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ceil fillenworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. I order the wrong size. Had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: greg gobby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes and it looks like they will not fall apart quickly. Looks like good construction.
customer_reviews.author: Dale J.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had these shoes for 3 months and they are completely falling apart! There are holes all through out the inside of the shoe and the outside is cracked in multiple places - extremely disappointing. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Rue H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable nice looking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: So far this shoe fits as expected. It is very comfortable and looks great. Glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Aireal

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Haniger 58355-bbk Trainers
product_meta.description: Modern, universal shoes with zip. Rich-Skins provide a luxurious, elegant look with delicate butter. Breathable and hygienic room climate is provided by a pleasant fibre system.
